document.full_text: a deputy sheriff in upstate new york was fatally shot while trying to calm a man attempting suicide, and his death prompted his wife to go into labor on tuesday with their second child, authorities said.
document.title: new york deputy sheriff killed, wife goes into labor
lines_and_colors: a deputy sheriff in upstate new york was fatally shot while trying to calm a man attempting suicide, and his death prompted his wife to go into labor on tuesday with their second child, authorities said.
